Step1:
The main beliefs are decisive for the followers of Jesus Christ.
You can't compromise with them and you can't ignore them.

Step2.li1: We believe that the Bible is the only Divinely inspired, infallible, sufficient, authoritative Word of God (1 Thessalonians 2:13; 2 Timothy 3:16-17).
Step2.li2: We believe that there is one God, eternally existing in three persons: God the Father, God the Son â€” Jesus Christ, the Holy Spirit. (Matthew 28:19; John 10:30).
Step2.li3: We believe in the Divinity of Jesus Christ (John 1:1-4; Philippians 2:5-11; 2 Peter1:1).

Step3.li1: We believe in the human nature of Jesus Christ, in His immaculate conception, sinless life, miracles, substitutionary and atoning death through His shed blood, in His bodily resurrection and ascension to the right hand of the Father (Matthew 1:18,25; 1 Corinthians 15:1-8; Hebrews 4:15; Acts 1:9-11; Acts 2:22-24).
Step3.li2: We believe that everyone inherits a sinful nature and therefore deserves eternal hell (Romans 3:23; Isaiah 64:6-7).

Step4.li1: We believe that salvation from sin is God's gift through the sacrificial death and resurrection of Jesus Christ and is received by grace by faith, not by works (John 3:16; John 14:6; Ephesians 2:8-9, Titus 3:3-7).
Step4.li2: We believe that true faith is always accompanied by repentance and regeneration by the power of the Holy Spirit (James 2:14-26; John 16:5-16; Romans 8:9).
Step4.li3: We believe in the ministry of the Holy Spirit who dwells in us, and that through Him the followers of Jesus Christ gain the strength to live a godly life (John 14:15-26; Ephesians 2:10; Galatians 5:16-18).

Step5.li1: We believe in the spiritual unity of all believers in the Lord Jesus Christ from all nations, languages and peoples (Philippians 2:1-4; Ephesians 1:22-23; 1 Corinthians 12:12,27).
Step5.li2: We believe in the personal and physical second coming of Jesus Christ (Matthew 24:30; Acts 1:10-11).
Step5.li3: We believe in the resurrection of the saved and the lost: the unsaved will rise to eternal damnation in hell, and the saved will rise to eternal bliss with God in heaven (Hebrews 9:27-28; Matthew 16:27; John 14:1-3; Matthew 25:31-46).

Step6: Secondary are all other beliefs in Scripture with which sincere followers of Christ may disagree (e.g., baptism, the Lord's supper, ascension, etc.). We agree to remain in disagreement on these issues and together strive for a common goal to teach all nations and make them disciples of Christ (Matthew 28:18-20).
